relatedBlades.title: Gartner® How to Select the Right ZTNA Offering, 2022
relatedBlades.copy:
The evolution of the Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) and Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) within the Security Service Edge (SSE) landscape has created a maze of overlapping offerings for security, technology, and management professionals to navigate.

This comprehensive report from Gartner®, How to Select the Right ZTNA Offering, provides valuable insights into ZTNA strategy considerations, explores common use cases, and outlines key capabilities that can help you shortlist ZTNA vendors. Read the report to discover how to align a vendor's ZTNA offering with your organization’s SSE strategy.

![ZTNA Diagram](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/Wfg3dJd40bCYEGIYAII4C/6acc3b39a253b0f0371eae048588e6ba/ztna-three-key-factors.png)

__Read this new report to learn__:
- What questions to ask shortlisted vendors when evaluating ZTNA technologies.
- How to map your security needs to the four main use cases of ZTNA.
- Considerations when aligning a vendor's ZTNA offering and your organization’s SSE strategy.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
GHow to Select the Right ZTNA Offer, Gartner, John Watts, Charlie Winckless, Craig Lawson, Aaron McQuaid, 28 February 2022
